channel.title: resume on William Hearn
channel.description: Recent content in resume on William Hearn

item.title: Resumé
item.description: Personal Highlights GoC Cloud Native Working Group Meetup Website GitHub Youtube Open Source involvement: Docker images (Drupal on alpine) Kubernetes Helm charts (Hadoop, NiFi, [Octopus][octopus], Kylo) Contributions to Azure AKS Engine (Chocolately), Blobporter, and Draft Maintainer of Drupal WxT 7⁄8 Drupal 7 WxT Drupal 8 WxT Technical Architect: Open Government Portal (Drupal 7⁄8) Statistics Canada Portal (Drupal 7⁄8) Education Honors, Bachelor of Computer Science, Carleton University // Minor in Psychology // September 2006 – August 2010
